definitions.definition: Not positive or neutral ; bad ; undesirable ; unfavourable .
examples: The high exchange rate will have a negative effect on our profits.
Customers didn’t like it: feedback was mostly negative .

definitions.definition: Of a number: less than zero.

subdefinitions.definition: Less than zero degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit .
examples: I was out in negative weather today.

definitions.definition: Of a test result: not positive, not detected.
Of electrical charge of an electron and related particles
Denying a proposition ; negating a concept .
Pessimistic ; not tending to see the bright side of things.
examples: I don’t like to hang around him very much because he can be so negative about his petty problems.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to a photographic image in which the colours of the original, and the relations of left and right , are reversed .
Metalloidal , nonmetallic ; contrasted with positive or basic .
Often preceded by emotion , energy , feeling , or thought : to be avoided , bad , difficult , disagreeable , painful , potentially damaging , unpleasant , unwanted .
Characterized by the presence of features which do not support a hypothesis .

main_definition: Not positive or neutral ; bad ; undesirable ; unfavourable .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) Of a number: less than zero.
( medicine ) Of a test result: not positive, not detected.
( physics ) Of electrical charge of an electron and related particles [from the 18th c.]
( linguistics , logic ) Denying a proposition ; negating a concept .
( often used pejoratively ) Pessimistic ; not tending to see the bright side of things.
Of or relating to a photographic image in which the colours of the original, and the relations of left and right , are reversed .
( chemistry ) Metalloidal , nonmetallic ; contrasted with positive or basic .
( New Age jargon , derogatory ) Often preceded by emotion , energy , feeling , or thought : to be avoided , bad , difficult , disagreeable , painful , potentially damaging , unpleasant , unwanted .
Characterized by the presence of features which do not support a hypothesis .
